titles.title: Honoring and congratulating chambers of commerce for their efforts that contribute to the improvement of communities and the strengthening of local and regional economies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Mr. Walden (OR) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Con. Res. 215.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/14/2003--Passed House without amendment. Honors and congratulates chambers of commerce for their efforts that contribute to the improvement of their communities and the strengthening of their local and regional economies.
